message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob! You can try to negotiate from here.
You wanted a fair split, so I'm matching it. No need to negotiate further, let's split it 50/50!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Can we talk about a slightly better split?
I'm willing to give you a bit less, but I think I deserve more than 40%. You can try to negotiate from here.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm still willing to give you a better deal, but I think I deserve more than 45%. Let's try to find a compromise.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up my share easily. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a fair split. I'm taking a firmer stance, but still willing to compromise.
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, but I'm willing to compromise. Take it or leave it.
